content.raw: I added unit tests in pull request #239 and pull request #245 that you can look at (SDF_Test.cc and BulletTypes_TEST.cc). Write a test file with the same name as the class with suffix _TEST.cc, then use the cmake macro gz_build_tests in the CMakeLists.txt.
content.html: I added unit tests in pull request #239 and pull request #245 that you can look at (SDF_Test.cc and BulletTypes_TEST.cc). Write a test file with the same name as the class with suffix _TEST.cc, then use the cmake macro gz_build_tests in the CMakeLists.txt.

content.raw: yep, that's the reason it was not ported into 1.3, a bunch of the parent sensor variables (hfov, etc.) that describes the sensor need to be migrated into `rendering::GpuLaser` class directly.  See [ticket](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/304/remove-dependency-of-rendering-gpulaser-on)
content.html: yep, that's the reason it was not ported into 1.3, a bunch of the parent sensor variables (hfov, etc.) that describes the sensor need to be migrated into rendering::GpuLaser class directly. See ticket
